info.description: Leverage ConvertAPIâ€™s high-performance PDF toolkit and document conversion features. Merge, split, compress, protect, redact, or rotate your PDF files, and convert them into editable Word, PowerPoint, or Excel documents using our fast and secure service. You can also extract text and tables from both textual and scanned PDFs, making it easy to generate CSV or XLSX outputs. Get your token at: https://www.convertapi.com. For questions or assistance, contact us at support@convertapi.com.
info.title: ConvertAPI

parameters.description: Choose a compression level from the available presets. If a preset is selected, all other compression options will be ignored. These presets are optimized for various use cases, such as balancing file size and quality., * `none` - Not set - advanced properties used, * `text` - Text - 20 image DPI, lowest quality, highest compression, * `archive` - Archive - 40 image DPI, low quality, high compression, * `web` - Web - 75 image DPI, medium quality, high compression, * `ebook` - Ebook - 150 image DPI, high quality, medium compression, * `printer` - Printer - 300 image DPI, high quality, low compression (This can only be one of none,text,archive,web,ebook,printer)
parameters.name: Preset

parameters.description: Remove duplicate fonts and color profiles from the PDF file.
parameters.name: RemoveDuplicates

parameters.description: Remove embedded/attachments files from the PDF file.
parameters.name: RemoveEmbeddedFiles

parameters.description: Remove PDF forms from the PDF file.
parameters.name: RemoveForms

parameters.description: Detach the XMP metadata embedded in the document from its catalog, clear all properties in all schemas, and remove metadata from marked content.
parameters.name: RemoveMetadata

parameters.description: Remove piece information dictionaries like Adobe Illustrator or Photoshop private data.
parameters.name: RemovePieceInformation

parameters.description: Remove all structure information from the PDF document.
parameters.name: RemoveStructureInformation

parameters.description: Remove references to resources such as fonts, images, patterns.
parameters.name: RemoveUnusedResources

parameters.description: Output PDF should only contain font characters utilized in the original document, and any unused glyphs from all fonts in the document should be removed.
parameters.name: SubsetEmbeddedFonts

parameters.description: Specifies whether to remove the base fonts from the PDF file.
parameters.name: UnembedBaseFonts

parameters.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.
parameters.name: StoreFile

parameters.description: (Required) File to be converted.
parameters.name: File
FileName
parameters.description: The FileName property defines the name of the output file(s) generated by the file conversion API, ensuring safe and unique file naming. It sanitizes input filenames to remove potentially harmful characters, automatically appends the correct file extension based on the target format, and includes an indexing feature to distinguish multiple output files from a single input. For example, converting report.docx to PDF format might result in report.pdf for a single file, or report_0.pdf, report_1.pdf for multiple files, ensuring each output file is uniquely identifiable.
Set image color space., * `rgb` - RGB, * `cmyk` - CMYK, * `gray` - Gray (This can only be one of rgb,cmyk,gray)

These are supported sRGB, Japan Color 2001 Coated (JC200103), Europe ISO Coated (FOGRA27), U.S. Web Coated (SWOP), Gray Gamma 2.2 (GRAY)., * `srgb` - sRGB, * `jc200103` - Japan Color 2001 Coated, * `fogra27` - Europe ISO Coated, * `swop` - U.S. Web Coated, * `gray` - Gray Gamma 2.2 (This can only be one of srgb,jc200103,fogra27,swop,gray)
parameters.name: PdfaOutputIntent

parameters.description: Set PDF/A version., * `pdfa` - PDF/A-1b, * `pdfa2` - PDF/A-2b, * `pdfa2u` - PDF/A-2u, * `pdfa3` - PDF/A-3b, * `pdfa3u` - PDF/A-3u (This can only be one of pdfa,pdfa2,pdfa2u,pdfa3,pdfa3u)

parameters.description: Enable or disable all permissions. The specific permissions listed below overrides this property.
parameters.name: AllowEverything

parameters.description: Enable or disable assembly of the document - insert, rotate, or delete pages and create bookmarks or thumbnail images.
parameters.name: AssembleDocument

parameters.description: Enable or disable copy or extract text and graphics from the document.
parameters.name: CopyContents

parameters.description: Encrypt metadata of PDF file.
parameters.name: EncryptMeta

parameters.description: Sets the encryption algorithm., * `Standard40Bit` - 40-bit RC4 algorithm. Acrobat 3 (PDF 1.1) and above, * `Standard128Bit` - 128-bit RC4 algorithm. Acrobat 5 (PDF 1.4) and above, * `Aes128Bit` - 128-bit AES algorithm. Acrobat 7 (PDF 1.6) and above, * `Aes256Bit` - 256-bit AES algorithm. PDF 2.0
parameters.name: EncryptionAlgorithm

parameters.description: Enable or disable extract text and graphics.
parameters.name: ExtractContents
FileName
parameters.description: Set the output file name (optional)
Enable or disable fill-in existing interactive form fields, including signature fields.
parameters.name: FillFormFields

parameters.description: Enable or disable adding or modifying text annotations and fill in interactive form fields.
parameters.name: ModifyAnnotations

parameters.description: Enable or disable changing the contents of the document.
parameters.name: ModifyContents

parameters.description: Sets owner password (also known as a permissions password). Using a owner password, you can restrict printing, editing, and copying content in the PDF. Recipients donâ€™t need a password to open the document. They do need a password to change the restrictions the owner set.
parameters.name: OwnerPassword

parameters.description: Sets the password to open protected documents.
parameters.name: Password

parameters.description: Enable the property if you want to keep the document permissions unchanged. It requires you to specify the OwnerPassword. If enabled, the document permission properties will be ignored.
parameters.name: PreservePermissions

parameters.description: Enable or disable document printing.
parameters.name: PrintDocument

parameters.description: Enable or disable printing of the document to a representation from which a faithful digital copy of the PDF content could be generated.
parameters.name: PrintFaithfulCopy

parameters.description: Enable the property if you want to respect the document's owner password and permissions. If disabled - the old owner's password and permissions will be removed by default. Setting this property requires you to enter the correct owner's password into the Password property for protected documents.
parameters.name: RespectOwnerPassword

parameters.description: Sets the user password (also known as a document open password) in the output PDF document. Users will be asked to enter this password before Acrobat Reader allows them to view the PDF document.
parameters.name: UserPassword

parameters.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.
parameters.name: StoreFile

post.description: Add encryption and set permissions on a PDF. Restrict printing, copying, or modifying. Configure owner/user passwords and encryption algorithms (RC4, AES, etc.).

parameters.name: CompressPDF

parameters.description: Each page included in this range will be split individually (one page per document). A page range or individual page numbers separated by a comma is supported (see SplitByCustomRange description for a detailed explanation).
parameters.name: ExtractPages
FileName
parameters.description: Set the output file name (optional)
Merge all ranges in one PDF file.
parameters.name: MergeRanges

parameters.description: Sets the password to open protected documents.
parameters.name: Password
SplitByCustomRange
parameters.description: Split PDF by a custom range. Individual page numbers separated by commas or page ranges are supported and can be combined. For example, if you set 1,3,4-5,6-9 for a ten-page PDF, it would create four PDF documents - the first PDF contains only the first page, the second PDF contains the third page, the third PDF contains pages from 3 to 5, and the last PDF contains pages from 6 to 9.

parameters.name: SplitByPattern
parameters.description: Split PDF into chunks of pages by a pattern. For example, if you set 3,2 for a ten-page PDF, it would be divided into four PDF files that contain 3,2,3,2 pages accordingly. The pattern is repeated until there are no pages left.

parameters.name: SplitByTextPattern
parameters.description: Split PDF by identifying text segments matching a specific regex pattern. This allows the document to be divided into separate files at each occurrence of the specified pattern, ideal for segmenting content by recurring headings, section labels, or custom text markers.
Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.
parameters.name: StoreFile

parameters.description: Set the page number at which the PDF document should open.
parameters.name: OpenPage

parameters.description: Set the default zoom percentage for when you open PDF files ., * `Default` - Default, * `ActualSize` - Actual Size, * `FitPage` - Fit Page, * `FitWidth` - Fit Width, * `FitHeight` - Fit Height, * `FitVisible` - Fit Visible, * `25` - 25%, * `50` - 50%, * `75` - 75%, * `100` - 100%, * `125` - 125%, * `150` - 150%, * `200` - 200%, * `400` - 400%, * `800` - 800%, * `1600` - 1600%, * `2400` - 2400%, * `3200` - 3200%, * `6400` - 6400%
parameters.name: OpenZoom

parameters.description: Set page range. Example 1-10 or 1,2,5.
parameters.name: PageRange

parameters.description: Specifies whether to use the page rotation parameter when placing watermark.
parameters.name: PageRotation

parameters.description: Sets the password to open protected documents.
parameters.name: Password

parameters.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF author. Otherwise, the default document author will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the author.
parameters.name: PdfAuthor

parameters.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF keywords. Otherwise, the default document keywords will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the keywords.
parameters.name: PdfKeywords

parameters.description: Set PDF resolution.
parameters.name: PdfResolution

parameters.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF subject. Otherwise, the default document subject will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the subject.
parameters.name: PdfSubject

parameters.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF title. Otherwise, the default document title will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the title.
parameters.name: PdfTitle

parameters.description: Set PDF version., * `1.2` - Acrobat 3 (PDF 1.2), * `1.3` - Acrobat 4 (PDF 1.3), * `1.4` - Acrobat 5 (PDF 1.4), * `1.5` - Acrobat 6 (PDF 1.5), * `1.6` - Acrobat 7 (PDF 1.6), * `1.7` - Acrobat 8 (PDF 1.7), * `1.8` - Acrobat 9 (PDF 1.7, e-level 3), * `2.0` - Acrobat DC (PDF 2.0)
parameters.name: PdfVersion

parameters.description: Specifies measurement unit to use for the PositionX and PositionY properties., * `pt` - points, * `in` - inches, * `mm` - millimeters, * `cm` - centimeters (This can only be one of pt,in,mm,cm)
parameters.name: PositionUnit

parameters.description: Specifies the watermark X coordinate. If set overrides property HorizontalAlignment.
parameters.name: PositionX

parameters.description: Specifies the watermark Y coordinate. If set overrides property VerticalAlignment.
parameters.name: PositionY

parameters.description: Specifies the watermark rotation angle in degrees.
parameters.name: Rotate

parameters.description: Automatically rotate pages based on the orientation of the text. By Page option will rotate each page based on the direction of the text on that page. All option will rotate all pages in the document based on the orientation of the majority of text., * `Disabled` - Disabled, * `ByPage` - By Page, * `All` - All (This can only be one of Disabled,ByPage,All)
parameters.name: RotatePage

parameters.description: Specifies font stroke color.
parameters.name: StrokeColor

parameters.description: Specifies the stroke width.
parameters.name: StrokeWidth

parameters.description: Specifies watermark style, stamp or watermark. The stamp is placed over page content and watermark under page content., * `stamp` - stamp, * `watermark` - watermark (This can only be one of stamp,watermark)
parameters.name: Style

parameters.description: Specifies whether to enable word wrap in case text does not fit in one line.
parameters.name: WordWrap

parameters.description: Include in the output PDF document only the font characters that are used in the original document.
parameters.name: SubsetFonts

parameters.description: Sets the Subset Fonts threshold. If the percentage of used characters, compared with total characters of the particular font, exceeds this threshold, the entire font is embedded.
parameters.name: SubsetFontsThreshold

parameters.description: (Required)
parameters.name: Text

parameters.description: Specifies the text rendering mode., * `filltext` - fill text without stroke, * `stroketext` - stroke text without fill, * `fillstroke` - fill and stroke, * `invisible` - invisible
parameters.name: TextRenderingMode

parameters.description: Specifies the vertical watermark alignment., * `top` - top, * `center` - center, * `bottom` - bottom (This can only be one of top,center,bottom)
parameters.name: VerticalAlignment

parameters.description: Store converted file on our secure server and provides download URL.
parameters.name: StoreFile

post.description: Overlay a text watermark or stamp onto PDF pages. Configure font, rotation, color, alignment, and optional linking. Works under or over page content.

parameters.description: (Required) File to be watermarked.
parameters.name: File

parameters.description: (Required) Specifies the PDF file to use as overlay. Value can be URL or file content.
parameters.name: OverlayFile
FileName
parameters.description: Set the output file name (optional)
Specifies the web address to go when the watermark is clicked.
parameters.name: GoToLink

parameters.description: Specifies the page number to go when the watermark is clicked.
parameters.name: GoToPage

parameters.description: Specifies the horizontal watermark alignment., * `left` - left, * `center` - center, * `right` - right (This can only be one of left,center,right)
parameters.name: HorizontalAlignment

parameters.description: Specifies watermark opacity level.
parameters.name: Opacity

parameters.description: Set the default zoom percentage for when you open PDF files ., * `Default` - Default, * `ActualSize` - Actual Size, * `FitPage` - Fit Page, * `FitWidth` - Fit Width, * `FitHeight` - Fit Height, * `FitVisible` - Fit Visible, * `25` - 25%, * `50` - 50%, * `75` - 75%, * `100` - 100%, * `125` - 125%, * `150` - 150%, * `200` - 200%, * `400` - 400%, * `800` - 800%, * `1600` - 1600%, * `2400` - 2400%, * `3200` - 3200%, * `6400` - 6400%
parameters.name: OpenZoom

parameters.description: Specifies the page to use as overlay from the OverlayFile file.
parameters.name: OverlayPage

parameters.description: Set page range. Example 1-10 or 1,2,5.

parameters.name: PageRotation

parameters.name: Password

parameters.name: PdfAuthor

parameters.description: Provide a value to customize the PDF keywords. Otherwise, the default document keywords will be used. Use single quotes and a space (' ') to remove the keywords.
parameters.name: PdfKeywords

parameters.description: Specifies measurement unit to use for the PositionX and PositionY properties., * `pt` - points, * `in` - inches, * `mm` - millimeters, * `cm` - centimeters (This can only be one of pt,in,mm,cm)
parameters.name: PositionUnit

parameters.description: Specifies the watermark X coordinate. If set overrides property HorizontalAlignment.
parameters.name: PositionX

parameters.description: Specifies the watermark Y coordinate. If set overrides property VerticalAlignment.
parameters.name: PositionY

parameters.description: Specifies the watermark scale in percent.
parameters.name: Scale

parameters.description: Specifies watermark style, stamp or watermark. The stamp is placed over page content and watermark under page content., * `stamp` - stamp, * `watermark` - watermark (This can only be one of stamp,watermark)
parameters.name: Style

parameters.description: Specifies the vertical watermark alignment., * `top` - top, * `center` - center, * `bottom` - bottom (This can only be one of top,center,bottom)

post.description: Use another PDF as a watermark or stamp overlay. Adjust opacity, position, page range, and more. Ideal for adding logos or disclaimers.

parameters.description: (Required) File to be watermarked.
parameters.name: File

parameters.description: Enable optical character recognition(OCR).
parameters.name: EnableOcr
FileName
parameters.description: Set the output file name (optional)
Include non-table content in an excel file, like images and paragraphs.
parameters.name: IncludeFormatting

parameters.description: Configure the OCR language for text recognition. If auto-detection fails, manually specify the language., * `automatic` - Automatic, * `ar` - Arabic, * `ca` - Catalan, * `zh` - Chinese, * `da` - Danish, * `nl` - Dutch, * `en` - English, * `fi` - Finnish, * `fr` - French, * `de` - German, * `gr` - Greek, * `ko` - Korean, * `it` - Italian, * `ja` - Japanese, * `no` - Norwegian, * `pl` - Polish, * `pt` - Portuguese, * `ro` - Romanian, * `ru` - Russian, * `sl` - Slovenian, * `es` - Spanish, * `sv` - Swedish, * `tr` - Turkish, * `th` - Thai (This can only be one of automatic,ar,ca,zh,da,nl,en,fi,fr,de,gr,ko,it,ja,no,pl,pt,ro,ru,sl,es,sv,tr,th)
parameters.name: OcrLanguage
